#Setup Your Environment

= Introduction =

Instructions on setting up the tutorial environment.


= Details =

== RSpec 1.1.3 ==

See: http://rspec.info/documentation/rails/install.html
  # ruby script/plugin install -x http://rspec.rubyforge.org/svn/tags/CURRENT/rspec
  # ruby script/plugin install -x http://rspec.rubyforge.org/svn/tags/CURRENT/rspec_on_rails
  # ruby script/generate rspec

== Installing SimplDB ==
See: http://www.slideshare.net/martin.rehfeld/amazon-simple-db-07-feb-2008-rug-b/
  # gem install aws-sdb
  # ruby script/plugin install -x http://rug-b.rubyforge.org/svn/aws_sdb_proxy

== Installing SQS ==
  # gem install SQS

== Installing restful_authentication ==
  # ruby script/plugin install -x http://svn.techno-weenie.net/projects/plugins/restful_authentication
  # script/generate authenticated user sessions --include-activation
